product_name: CamelBak Zoid Hydration Snow Pack -70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: Fill 'er up and strap on the women's CamelBak Zoid hydration snow pack for a full day on the slopes. It holds 70 fl. oz. of water, along with a compartment for keys, a map and other small necessities. Women-specific Therminator(TM) harness makes it easy to get to your mouthpiece for a drink; it stores a hand warmer (sold separately) to help prevent tube freezing. Fully insulated hydration system features a foam-wrapped, quick-disconnect delivery tube; reservoir holds up to 70 fl. oz. (2 liters) to quench your thirst on demand. Reservoir features a lightweight fill port, a low-profile design and a cap that opens and closes easily; strategically placed access zipper makes it easy to fill the reservoir. HydroGuard(TM) technology inhibits bacterial growth on reservoir and tube surfaces (but does not protect user from disease organisms; wash reservoir after each use). Padded Snowshed(TM) back panel shrugs off moisture when you set your pack down in the snow.
short_description: Fill 'er up and strap on the women's CamelBak Zoid hydration snow pack for a full day on the slopes. It holds 70 fl. oz. of water, along with a compartment for keys, a map and other small necessities.
